main.name: Christian Webb
main.description: I enjoy learning new things and pride myself on beinbg able to overcome any obsticle I might be faced with. Also working as part of a team excites me, discussing problems and then overcoming them with peers .
main.bio: I am currently in my third year of my MEng in Electrical and Electronic Engineering at the University of Southampton, accredited by IET and IEEE. I am in love with learning new concepts and acting on new ideas.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: MEng in Electrical and Electronic Engineering
Finished A-levels with A* in Mathematics and Physics and a B in Computer Science

work.title: Physics Technician
work.description: As apart of the job I would setup up lab experiments for the students and then help with carrying out said experiments. Once completed, myself and the leading teacher would mark their logbooks and provide feedback. I would also tutor students who were falling behind and needed help.

projects.title: OpenGL Framework
projects.description: My open source custom OpenGL framework to allow easy and quick use of GPU rendering. This cube was created with said framework along with a brownian motion based fragment shader.

projects.title: MIPS Emulator
projects.description: Microprocessor without Interlocked Pipelined Stages (MIPS) Emulator along with custom built assmbler.

projects.title: Website Code
projects.description: The code for this current website.
